articles.description: After ten years of bootstrapped and profitable growth, Octopus Deploy has secured a mammoth $223 million investment from Insight Partners.
articles.content:
Octopus Deploy founders Paul and Sonia Stovell. Source: supplied. 
Octopus Deploy has been operating at a profit for the best part of a decade, has turned down a $100,000 acquisition bid, and has ne… [+4214 chars]
